menu.name: Special Deluxe
menu.description: An exquisite combination of premium ingredients including wagyu beef, truffle aioli, and aged cheddar, served on a brioche bun.

menu.name: Cheesy BBQ
menu.description: A mouthwatering burger featuring a juicy beef patty smothered in melted cheddar cheese and tangy barbecue sauce.

menu.name: Ultimate Bacon
menu.description: Indulge in this delectable burger topped with crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and zesty mayo.

menu.name: Mushroom Madness
menu.description: Savor the rich flavors of this gourmet burger adorned with saut√©ed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese.

menu.name: Smoky Ranch
menu.description: A tantalizing barbecue burger featuring smoky ranch sauce, crispy onion rings, and tangy pickles.

menu.name: Fiery Jalapeno
menu.description: Feel the heat with this fiery burger topped with sliced jalapenos, pepper jack cheese, and chipotle mayo.

menu.name: Avocado Bliss
menu.description: Indulge in a healthier option with a turkey patty, sliced avocado, crisp lettuce, and ripe tomato.

menu.name: Beyond Burger
menu.description: A vegetarian delight featuring a plant-based patty, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and special sauce. (Not really a veggie burger)

menu.name: Double Bacon Extravaganza
menu.description: For the ultimate burger experience, enjoy two juicy beef patties, double bacon, and melted cheese.

menu.name: Classic Fries
menu.description: Crispy golden fries seasoned to perfection with just the right amount of salt and pepper.

menu.name: Sweet Potato Delight
menu.description: Enjoy the sweet and savory flavors of our crispy sweet potato fries seasoned with salt, pepper, and a touch of chili.

menu.name: Choco Lovers' Delight
menu.description: Satisfy your chocolate cravings with this creamy milkshake made with the finest chocolate ingredients.

menu.name: Berry Bliss
menu.description: Experience the refreshing taste of summer with our creamy milkshake made with luscious strawberry ice cream.

menu.name: Craft Beer - Hoppy IPA
menu.description: Savor the hoppy goodness of this pale ale beer, meticulously brewed and named after Frida.

menu.name: Sparkling Tonic
menu.description: Quench your thirst with this healthy and refreshing sparkling tonic.

menu.name: Tropical Paradise
menu.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with this refreshing sparkling water sourced from China's best waterfalls.

menu.name: Coconut Delight
menu.description: Experience the tropical flavors of fresh coconut water straight from the coconut.
